entry.def: Technological means relating to or associated with technology.

example.ex: ...an era of very rapid technological change.
example.tran: 科技发生迅猛变革的时代

means.word_mean: 1. based in scientific and industrial progress;
2. of or relating to a practical subject that is organized according to scientific principles;

auth_sentence.content: So the hunt is on for a technological fix.
auth_sentence.res_content: So the hunt is on for a technological fix.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So the hunt is on for a technological fix.

auth_sentence.content: The barrier isn't technological, it's financial.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The barrier isn't technological, it's financial.

auth_sentence.content: You can't stop that by any technological means.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can't stop that by any technological means.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can't stop that by any technological means.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 各种工艺的,多种工艺的
stems_affixes.word_buile: poly多+technic[n.技术, 手法]→n.专门技术学校 adj.各种工艺的,多种工艺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 技术[性]的,工艺的;专门性的,专业性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: techn技术,能力+ical……的→adj.技术[性]的,工艺的;专门性的,专业性的
technology[n.科学技术;工业技术;应用科学]+ic表形容词→technologic
technologic[adj.工艺的, 技术的]+al表形容词→adj.科技的
poly多+technic[n.技术, 手法]→n.专门技术学校 adj.各种工艺的,多种工艺的
techn技术,能力+ic→n.技术, 手法
technic[n.技术, 手法]+ian人→n.技术员, 技师

stems_affixes.value_cn: 技术, 技巧, 方法, 表演法, 手法
stems_affixes.word_buile: techn技术,能力+ique→n.技术, 技巧, 方法, 表演法, 手法

stems_affixes.value_cn: 科学技术;工业技术;应用科学
stems_affixes.word_buile: techn技术,能力+ology学科→n.科学技术;工业技术;应用科学

Sentence.sentence: For clues to the book's future, let's look at some examples of technological change and see what happened to the old technology.
Fire was one of the earliest major technological advances for humankind, providing heat, protection, and cooked food (which is much easier to cat and digest)

Parents and students who have invested heavily in higher education worry about graduates' job prospects as technological advances and changes in domestic and global markets transform professions in ways that reduce wages and cut jobs.
In 1976, congress enacted the latest copy right law, taking into consideration the technological developments that had occurred since the passage of the copy right act of 1909.
It cannot be realized without technological innovation.
Typically, parents have fewer technological resources at their disposal than do schools.

sentences.en: His parents are scientific and technological workers.
sentences.cn: 他的父母都是科技工作者。

sentences.en: A successful company must keep up with the pace of technological change.
sentences.cn: 一家成功的公司必须得跟上技术变革的步伐。

sentences.en: He claimed that his country was years ahead of the rest of the world in technological development.
sentences.cn: 他声称他的国家在技术发展方面比世界其他国家都要先进许多年。

means.word_mean: 由于技术原因的,因技术革新而造成的

sentences.cn: 因采用新技术而造成的失业
